sect1.title: OpenACS Installation Guide for Mac OS X

listitem.para: Extract readline in /usr/local/src, configure, compile, and install:

screen.userinput: su - root cd /usr/local/src tar xvfz readline-4.3.tar.gz readline-4.3 ./configure make make install

listitem.para: Proceed with the Unix-like system instructions. OS X is incompatible with Oracle 8, and Oracle 9i on OSX is not yet verified for OpenACS. So continue with . Additional special steps for OS X are documented inline with the standard Unix-like instructions.
